data.title: On the Brightness of the Thomson Lamp: A Prolegomenon to Quantum Recursion Theory
data.meta_description: Some physical aspects related to the limit operations of the Thomson lamp are discussed. Regardless of the formally unbounded and even infinite number of “steps” involved, the physical limit has an operational meaning in agreement with the Abel sums of...
